description: This file defines a Flutter widget page for displaying a calendar with festivals and tithi information. It uses TableCalendar for the calendar UI, and manages internal state to respond to user interactions such as selecting days and changing months.

classes.name: CalendarPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a calendar with festival markers and day details.

classes.name: _CalendarPageState
classes.description: State class managing the calendar's state, including selected day, focused day, and festival data.

classes.name: _DayDetailsSheet
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that shows detailed information for a selected day, including festivals and tithi.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes festivals for the current month when widget state is created.

methods.name: _festsOn
methods.description: Filters the festivals occurring on a specific day.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the calendar page, including the calendar view and festivals list.

methods.name: _DayDetailsSheet
methods.description: Builds the widget showing details for the selected day.
